references: Amending: Ord 42337. Repealing: Ord 67364, Ord 68200, Ord 68427, Ord 68708, Ord 69425, Ord 69463, Ord 69813, Ord 69821, Ord 70666
summary: An ordinance relating to the harbor and waterfront of the City of Seattle; defining oil and flammable liquid; regulating the storage thereof; amending Sections 2 and 38 of Ordinance No. 42337 as amended, and repealing Ordinance Nos. 67364, 68200, 68427, 68708, 69425, 69463, 69813, 69821 and 70666.
